heroText: I'm a software engineer specializing in crafting digital solutions for your business and creating exceptional digital experiences for your customers and audience.
aboutHist: I've been passionate about computer science ever since I discovered it, and I've been learning about its inner workings ever since. I earned my Professional Bachelor's Degree in Computer Engineering in 2016 and have applied my skills in various capacities. For a little over four years, I worked in networking, primarily providing technical support remotely and occasionally on-site for both homes and businesses. My responsibilities included the installation and maintenance of LANs, ADSL connections, and all connected devices. During that time, I also provided software development services on a freelance basis.
aboutPresent: Since 2020, I have decided to focus on software development. I've deepened and expanded my skills in various technologies and earned several certifications. Now, I offer my expertise in creating digital platforms and experiences. I specialize in designing and developing websites as well as web, mobile, and desktop applications.
aboutTechIntro: Here are some of the technologies I've been working with recently:
featureProjectDesc1: A multilingual website for Samaritan Auto, an automotive assistance service that offers users 24/7 operational roadside assistance.
featureProjectDesc2: A platform for a self-improvement community featuring a blog and a members' area, among other features.
featureProjectDesc3: Sportaabe is a mobile application that facilitates access to local sports activities, allowing users to discover, register for events, and connect with sports professionals while promoting health and community engagement.
contactText: Whether you'd like to take advantage of my services, hire me, or simply connect to expand your network, send me an email by clicking the button below.
footerThanks: Special thanks to Brittany Chiang for the initial design and implementation.
